analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x740380ebe159999a8614bdecde6942a0fb9d7eed.sol:
	Contract IOUCosmosToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x740380ebe159999a8614bdecde6942a0fb9d7eed.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x740380ebe159999a8614bdecde6942a0fb9d7eed.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
